name: battery_status
description: Get the battery status of the device.

number.description: The phone number to send the SMS to.

name: location
description: Get the current location of the device.

provider.description: The location provider (gps, network, passive). Default is gps.

request.description: Kind of request (once, last, updates). Default is once.

name: camera_photo
description: Take a photo using the device camera.

camera.description: The camera ID to use (0 for back, 1 for front). Default is 0.

filename.description: The filename to save the photo as (e.g. photo.jpg).

name: clipboard_get
description: Get the content of the clipboard.

name: clipboard_set
description: Set the content of the clipboard.

text.description: The text to set in the clipboard.

name: notification
description: Show a notification on the device.

name: create_tool
description: Create a new tool dynamically. Use this to add new capabilities to the agent. Requires a valid JSON schema for parameters and a shell script for implementation.

name.description: The name of the new tool (snake_case).

description.description: A description of what the tool does.

parameters.description: The JSON schema for the tool parameters (as a JSON string).

script.description: The shell script content that implements the tool. It receives arguments as $1 (JSON string).
